mapper.insert: INSERT INTO signup( member_no, member_id, password, name, gender, birth, mail, phone, address, regdate, secession, profilepic ) VALUES ( #{member_no}, #{member_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{mail}, #{phone}, #{address}, sysdate(), '1', #{profilepic} )
mapper.update: UPDATE signup SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, mail = #{mail}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
UPDATE signup SET secession = 3 WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, name, gender, birth, mail, phone, address FROM signup WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
